TextBlock.Text: Kestrel: Is everyone okay? I didn't expect that we'd crash into a rogue planet... though with the stars becoming increasingly unstable, we should've expected something like this would eventually happen.

Solara: Everyone's a little shaken, but fine. Of all the places to end up, this planet seems like it has the resources to keep us alive until we can contact the other <color=orange>Escape Pods</color>.
Lotus: There may be one slight issue with contacting the others...
Kestrel: And what might that be, Lotus?
Lotus: Our <color=orange>Distress Beacon</color> was damaged in the crash. The others won't be able to track us down without it.

Solara: Not to worry, Lotus. During our <color=orange>Escape Pod's</color> launch from the <color=orange>Vessel</color>, it seemed that the first and third pods were on course to end up relatively close to each other.
Lotus: While it's reassuring to know that the others are likely safe and reunited, what does that mean for us?
Solara: It means we can use what's left of our <color=orange>Distress Beacon</color> and hijack the frequencies from the other pods to point straight to us!
Kestrel: And we can all rest assured that eventually we'll be found by the others, or perhaps even by another <color=orange>Clan</color>.
Kestrel: While you're doing that, Solara, the rest of us will have a look around.
